xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: WebHome
xwikidoc.content: This space contains tests for code which is in module xwiki-platform-web. The features tested are: * Wiki Editor * Jump To Page * Bottom Tabs (Comments, Attachments, History, Information) * Edit Page (Wiki, Object, Rights) * Top Add button (Add Page, Add Space) * Page actions (Delete Page, Copy Page, Share Page by Email) {{include reference="QA.TestSpaceWebHomeTemplate"/}}
